name: CreateTicketType
description:
Create a new ticket type with default attributes.

This tool allows creating a new ticket type in Intercom, including default title and description attributes. An emoji icon can be added using the Twemoji Cheatsheet.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the Intercom API to use for the request. Valid values are: 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: ticket_type_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing ticket type details, including name, description, icon (Twemoji), and internal use status.

name.description: The name of the ticket type.

description.description: The description of the ticket type.

icon.description: The icon of the ticket type.

is_internal.description: Whether the tickets associated with this ticket type are intended for internal use only or will be shared with customers. This is currently a limited attribute.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

name.description: The name of the ticket type.

description.description: The description of the ticket type.

icon.description: The icon of the ticket type.

is_internal.description: Whether the tickets associated with this ticket type are intended for internal use only or will be shared with customers. This is currently a limited attribute.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
